thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 23 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-IOI Corporation Posts Qtrly Net Profit Of 595.9 Mln Rgt

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-IOI Corporation Posts Qtrly Net Profit Of 595.9 Mln Rgt
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - IOI Corporation Bhd:
* QTRLY REV‍ 2.40 BILLION RGT * QTRLY NET PROFIT 595.9 MILLION RGT * YEAR AGO QTRLY REV‍ 2.51 BILLION RGT; YEAR AGO QTRLY NET PROFIT 15.6 MILLION RGT
* DECLARED INTERIM SINGLE TIER DIVIDEND OF 4.5 SEN PER ORDINARY SHARE FOR FY ENDING 30 JUNE 2018
* EXPECT PERFORMANCE OF PLANTATION SEGMENT TO BE POSITIVE DURING THE NEXT THREE MONTHS
* DIVESTMENT OF 70% EQUITY INTEREST IN LODERS CROKLAAN GROUP B.V. EXPECTED TO BE COMPLETED IN Q3
* BOTH OLEOCHEMICAL AND SPECIALTY FATS SUB-SEGMENTS EXPECTED TO PERFORM WELL DURING THE NEXT SIX MONTHS‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2sP07WU ) Further company coverage:
